title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: Pressing the Delete button deletes the first item on the second row and moves the Launch item to the first row. This corrupts the layout.
EB: Pressing the Delete button should only delete the first item on the second row and leave the Launch item on the second row. The layout should not be corrupted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row, corrupting the layout.
